titles.title: Our times are in Thy hand

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: Our times are in Thy hand: Whatever they may be; Pleasing or painful, dark or bright, As best may seem to Thee.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Our times are in Thy hand; Why should we doubt or fear? A father’s hand will never cause His child a needless tear.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Our times are in Thy hand; Jesus, the Crucified, Whose hand our many sins have pierced, Is now our guard and guide.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Our times are in Thy hand; We’ll always trust to Thee, Till we possess the promised crown, And all Thy glory see.
